addon.name: RPI Backlight Brightness Control

extension.summary: Raspberry Pi DSI Touchdisplay Backlight Control
extension.description: Plugin to manipulate the backlight brightness of the Raspberry Pi 7" DSI display.
extension.disclaimer: Works with Rasperry Pi 7" Display only. Distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY!
extension.summary: Raspberry Pi DSI Touchdisplay Backlight Einstellungen
extension.description: Plugin mit dem sich die Helligkeit des Raspberry Pi 7" DSI Touchdisplay einstellen lässt.
extension.disclaimer: Nur für das Raspberry Pi 7" Display geignet. Nutzung auf eigene Gefahrt.

addon.news: v0.3.0 (2023) - update to Kodi 20 (Nexus) v0.2.0 (2022-02-20) - change dependency from Python 2 to Python 3 v0.1.1 (2017-03-04) - update to Kodi 17.0 (Krypton) v0.1.0 (2016-07-02) - Initial Release - adds a experimental add-on to configure the brightness of the backlight - adds a service that configure the brightness on startup
